title: How accurate are the memes in comparing Tamer Rice and Kyle Rittenhouse?
subtitle: The social media compared the fatal shooting by the police in 2014 of Tamir Rice, a 12-year-old black boy, with the treatment by the police in 2020 of 17-year-old Kyle Rittenhouse, a white boy.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: According to Meems, Tamir Rice, a black boy, was killed for possession of a fake toy weapon, while Kyle Rittenhouse, a white man, walked in front of the police after killing two people with an assault rifle, and managed to go home and sleep.
